title: Prepaid Cards - Gamestop
body: Does Riot accept $5 Gamestop cards? I was looking at the LoL website for prepaid cards, and only $10 cards from Gamestop are accepted. Is the site outdated, or do you truly not accept $5 cards?

replies.body: Microsoft Rewards offers a $5 Gamestop Gift Card, and I had been wondering if Riot accepted those or not. The rewards system doesn't have an option for a $10 Gamestop Gift Card either, so apparently that's just not an option at all.

I think you may be referencing **Openbucks**, where you can exchange certain gift cards for RP. If so, it doesn't look like Gamestop is a card that's used in this system at the moment. Check out the [Openbucks FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-) for more details on this system.

If you're just meaning Prepaid RP Cards, $10 is the minimum amount for these, so you cannot purchase a prepaid card for the $5 you currently have on your Gamestop card. I hope this clears up the confusion. Let me know if you have any questions.

There are no 5$ prepaid cards in LoL. More details here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-#where
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prepaid-cards
